ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We supported them and so they were the victors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And helped them, so they were victorious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We succoured them, and they gained the upper hand (against their enemies).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We helped them and they were victorious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We helped them, so they were victorious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And helped them, so that they became the victors;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We helped them, so they were the vanquishers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And We helped them, so that they were the victors;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And helped them so that they became the victors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and We helped them, so that they were victorious;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We succoured them so that they became overcomers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and We helped them so that they became the victors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We helped them, so they overcame (their troubles);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And helped them, so that they became the victors;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We helped them, and they became victorious,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We supported them, and so they were the victors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We supported them so it was they who overcame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:116] And We helped them, against the Egyptians, so that they became the victors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And helped them) against Pharaoh and his host (so that they became the victors) by means of proof.
